predicted_strategy: Launch generic at 60% discount immediately upon patent expiry.
impact: Severe erosion of market share within 6 months.

predicted_strategy: Focus on FDC combinations with metformin to differentiate from plain generic.
impact: Capture compliance-focused prescriber segment.

predicted_strategy: Accelerate clinical trials for subcutaneous PD-L1 inhibitor to capture convenience segment.
impact: Loss of naive patients who prefer easier administration.

predicted_strategy: Expand combination therapy approvals to match Keytruda's indication portfolio.
impact: Head-to-head competition in overlapping indications.

predicted_strategy: Launch authorized generic to discourage other entrants.
impact: Maintains some revenue stream but lowers margin.

predicted_strategy: Aggressive pricing strategy at 70% discount to gain market share quickly.
impact: Price war likely, margin compression across market.

predicted_strategy: Launch with strong field force push in tier 2/3 cities in India.
impact: Capture untapped market segments in emerging markets.

predicted_strategy: Launch generic with patient assistance program and pulmonologist tie-ups.
impact: Price-sensitive patients may switch; maintain differentiation through services.

predicted_strategy: Launch generic dry powder inhaler as Respimat alternative for simpler use.
impact: Device preference may shift to simpler alternatives.

predicted_strategy: Commoditization with price-based competition.
impact: Margin pressure, differentiation only through FDCs and devices.

predicted_strategy: Position as more efficacious dual-agonist with superior weight loss data.
impact: Fierce competition for obesity market share; potential to overtake in some segments.

predicted_strategy: Launch oral formulation to capture needle-averse patients.
impact: Expands addressable market but cannibalizes injectable revenue.

predicted_strategy: Aggressive biosimilar pricing in India at 50% discount.
impact: Rapid market share capture in price-sensitive emerging markets.

predicted_strategy: Shift prescribers to oral JAK inhibitor as convenient alternative.
impact: Gradual migration away from injectables in mild-to-moderate cases.

predicted_strategy: Price erosion with commodity positioning.
impact: Brand differentiation only through extended-release formulations.

predicted_strategy: Position next-gen PCAB as superior acid suppression with faster onset.
impact: Premium segment capture from refractory GERD patients.

predicted_strategy: Complete commoditization; compete on price and distribution.
impact: Zero brand premium; differentiation only through FDCs.

predicted_strategy: Biosimilar launch at 40% discount with oncologist education programs.
impact: Significant market share shift to biosimilars in cost-sensitive markets.

predicted_strategy: Position ADC as more effective in later lines; expand to earlier lines with new data.
impact: Threat to standard HER2 therapy in salvage settings.

impact: Rapid revenue decline; Bristol Myers Celgene loses over 70% of sales.
